text: The 1946 Portland Pilots football team was an American football team that represented the University of Portland as an independent during the 1946 college football season. In its first year under head coach Hal Moe, the team compiled a 1–4–1 record. The team played its home games at Multnomah Stadium in Portland, Oregon. ==Schedule== ==References== Portland Category:Portland Pilots football seasons Portland Pilots football Portland Pilots football
title: 1946 Portland Pilots football team
